text:
Kanye goes on a fashion rant

Rapper Kanye West, in a fresh Twitter rant, has said he hates suits and jackets, particularly on women. The rapper also criticised people who associate combat boots with “youth” and stylists who copy French designer Hedi Slimane. While on a flight back from Paris, West began: “I don’t personally like suit jackets anymore,” adding: “I especially hate suit jackets on women... that was a groundbreaking idea 5 million years ago! ... I feel we are so stuck in the past and tradition.” He explained that he came to Paris Fashion Week just for his designer friends, blasting the rest of the fashion world as “sooooooo fake.” — PTI
title: The Hindu
